page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Web Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenance
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

components.name: Identity, Security & Operations || Key Management Service

incidents.name: [GRA][Web Hosting] - SharedSQL incident notification
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that the incident on our Web Hosting offering has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 08/07/2025 07:47 UTC End time : 08/07/2025 09:46 UTC Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster027
incidents.message: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : We have not observed any disruption since 08/07/2025 07:20 UTC. Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue. Ongoing Actions : Our technical team is currently monitoring the incident. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [GRA1][Web Hosting] - All Clusters incident notification.
incidents.message: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : The Net2FTP service is currently no longer supported. We invite you to use heavy clients like filezilla / cyberduck and others Please find guides about this FTP clients : Tutorial - Using FileZilla with your OVHcloud hosting Tutorial - Using Cyberduck with a web hosting plan We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
